lessons.title: Hormone Health Foundation
lessons.subtitle: Understanding the root causes of hormonal imbalance and why this work matters

sections.content: Hey {name}! Welcome to your Hormone Health Specialist certification journey. You are stepping into one of the most in-demand areas of wellness right now. Millions of women are walking around exhausted, anxious, gaining weight, losing hair, and being told by their doctors that their labs are 'normal.' They are not normal. They are desperate for someone who actually understands what is happening inside their body. That someone is about to be you.
What Is Hormone Health Coaching?

Hormone health coaching is the practice of educating and supporting clients through **hormonal imbalances** that affect every aspect of their daily life. Hormones are chemical messengers that regulate metabolism, mood, energy, sleep, weight, fertility, and cognitive function. When even one hormone is out of balance, the entire system can feel like it is falling apart.

As a **Hormone Health Specialist**, you do not diagnose or treat. You educate clients on how their hormones work, help them identify lifestyle factors that may be contributing to imbalance, and guide them through evidence-based nutrition and lifestyle strategies that support optimal hormone function.

Hormone health coaching fills the massive gap between a doctor saying 'your labs are normal' and a woman feeling terrible every single day. You help her understand WHY she feels the way she does and what lifestyle changes can make a real difference.
Why Hormone Imbalance Is an Epidemic

We are living in an environment that is actively working against our hormones. **Endocrine disruptors** in plastics, pesticides, personal care products, and processed foods are flooding our systems with chemicals that mimic or block natural hormones. Chronic stress keeps cortisol elevated, which steals resources from progesterone, thyroid hormones, and estrogen balance. Poor sleep disrupts melatonin and growth hormone. The modern lifestyle is a perfect storm for hormonal chaos.
The hormone health crisis in numbers:
items: Over **80%** of women report symptoms of hormonal imbalance at some point in their lives
The average woman waits **4.5 years** and sees **5 different doctors** before getting proper hormonal support
Endocrine disruptor exposure has increased **300%** in the last 30 years
The hormone health market is projected to reach **$67 billion** by 2028
Fewer than **3%** of medical school training covers hormonal health beyond basic reproduction

sections.content: Here is the opportunity, {name}: millions of women are searching for answers their doctors cannot or will not provide. They are spending thousands on supplements, fad diets, and random wellness products. They need a trained specialist who can help them understand their bodies and take targeted action.
The 5 Root Causes of Hormonal Imbalance

When a client comes to you feeling exhausted, moody, gaining weight, losing hair, or struggling with her cycle, the underlying issue can almost always be traced to one or more of these **five root causes**. This framework gives you a lens for understanding what is really going on beneath the surface symptoms.
The 5 root causes you will address as a Hormone Health Specialist:
items: **Chronic Stress and Cortisol Dysregulation** — The HPA axis gets stuck in overdrive, stealing pregnenolone from progesterone production (the pregnenolone steal), disrupting thyroid function, spiking blood sugar, and creating a cascade of downstream hormonal chaos.

**Blood Sugar Instability** — Insulin is the master hormone. When blood sugar spikes and crashes throughout the day, it drives up testosterone (hello, chin hairs and acne), suppresses ovulation, increases inflammation, and makes weight loss nearly impossible.

**Gut Dysfunction and Estrogen Metabolism** — The estrobolome, a collection of gut bacteria, is responsible for metabolizing estrogen. When gut health is compromised, estrogen gets recycled instead of eliminated, leading to estrogen dominance symptoms like heavy periods, breast tenderness, and mood swings.

**Environmental Toxin Exposure** — Endocrine disruptors in plastics, beauty products, cleaning supplies, and pesticides mimic estrogen in the body (xenoestrogens), block thyroid receptors, and overwhelm the liver's detoxification pathways.

**Nutrient Deficiencies** — Hormones cannot be made without raw materials. Magnesium, zinc, vitamin D, B vitamins, selenium, and omega-3 fatty acids are critical building blocks that most women are deficient in due to soil depletion, processed diets, and stress-related nutrient depletion.

checkpoint.question: Which of the following is a root cause of hormonal imbalance covered in this lesson?
checkpoint.successMessage: Exactly! Insulin is the master hormone. Blood sugar instability drives testosterone up, suppresses ovulation, and makes weight loss nearly impossible.

sections.content: Scope of Practice

As an ASI-certified **Hormone Health Specialist**, you operate within a clear and professional scope. You educate clients on how hormones work and how lifestyle factors influence hormonal balance. You guide nutrition, sleep, stress management, and environmental changes that support hormone health. You help clients track symptoms and identify patterns.

You do NOT diagnose hormonal conditions, prescribe bioidentical hormones or supplements, interpret lab results, or replace medical care. You refer to endocrinologists, functional medicine doctors, and OB-GYNs when clients need clinical intervention. Staying in scope is what makes you credible and protectable.

revealCard.teaser: See how a former teacher built a $7,200/month hormone health practice...
revealCard.content: Maria was a 47-year-old middle school teacher who had been struggling with her own hormonal imbalance for years — fatigue, weight gain, brain fog, irregular periods. After getting certified as a Hormone Health Specialist, she started helping other women in her community who were experiencing the same frustrations. Within 4 months she had 12 clients on monthly coaching packages at $350/month. She left teaching 6 months later. Her exact words: 'I went from being told my labs were fine to helping other women understand their bodies. This is the most meaningful work I have ever done.'

sections.content: Why YOU Are Called to This Work

If you are here, chances are you have experienced hormonal imbalance yourself. Maybe you have struggled with fatigue, weight gain, mood swings, or painful periods. Maybe you have watched your mother, sister, or best friend suffer without answers. That lived experience is not a weakness — it is your greatest asset. You understand the frustration, the gaslighting, the desperation. And now you are going to learn how to help.
Can you see yourself helping women finally understand what is happening with their hormones?
What Is Coming Next

In the next lesson, you will learn the **D.E.P.T.H. Method** — the proprietary framework that gives you a structured, repeatable process for guiding every hormone health client through assessment, education, and transformation. This is the system that separates certified professionals from well-meaning amateurs.

keyTakeaways: Hormone health coaching fills the gap between 'your labs are normal' and a woman feeling terrible every day
Five root causes drive hormonal imbalance: cortisol dysregulation, blood sugar instability, gut dysfunction, toxin exposure, and nutrient deficiencies
Over 80% of women experience hormonal imbalance symptoms, creating massive demand for trained specialists

lessons.title: The D.E.P.T.H. Method™
lessons.subtitle: Your systematic framework for hormone health coaching sessions

sections.content: Welcome back, {name}! In Lesson 1 you learned what hormone health coaching is and the 5 root causes of hormonal imbalance. Now I am going to give you the exact framework I use with EVERY client — the system that took me from nervous beginner to a practitioner earning **$5,000 to $10,000+ monthly** from home.

This is the **D.E.P.T.H. Method** — the step-by-step system that hundreds of ASI graduates use to get real, measurable results for their hormone health clients. When you master this, you will never feel lost with a client again.
Why You Need a Framework

Here is a secret the wellness industry does not tell you: the number one reason new coaches fail is not lack of knowledge. It is lack of a **system**. Without a framework, every client feels like starting from scratch. You second-guess yourself. You spend more time researching than coaching. Your clients sense your uncertainty and do not re-enroll.
With the D.E.P.T.H. Method, you have a proven roadmap for EVERY hormone health client, regardless of their specific imbalance. **Confidence replaces confusion. Results replace guesswork.**
The D.E.P.T.H. Method™ for Hormone Health
This is the exact 5-step framework that transforms you from an overwhelmed beginner into a practitioner with a waiting list. Each letter represents a critical phase of the client journey.

steps.title: Discover
steps.description: Conduct a comprehensive hormone health intake. Explore the client's full health timeline — menstrual history, stress levels, sleep patterns, diet, digestion, energy fluctuations, weight changes, mood patterns, and any medications or supplements. Go beyond symptoms to understand the whole picture.

steps.title: Evaluate
steps.description: Map the client's symptoms against the 5 root causes of hormonal imbalance. Is this cortisol-driven? Blood sugar instability? Gut-mediated estrogen dominance? Toxin exposure? Nutrient deficiencies? Most clients have 2-3 interconnected root causes creating their hormonal chaos.

steps.title: Pinpoint
steps.description: Prioritize the root cause that is creating the most disruption RIGHT NOW. For hormone health, this almost always starts with blood sugar and cortisol — because until those are stabilized, nothing else will work. Create a focused action plan for the first 30 days.

steps.title: Transform
steps.description: Implement targeted nutrition and lifestyle changes: blood sugar-balancing meals, cortisol-lowering routines, gut-supporting protocols, toxin reduction strategies, and targeted nutrient repletion through whole foods. Each recommendation is personalized to the root causes you pinpointed.

steps.title: Heal
steps.description: Monitor progress through symptom tracking, adjust protocols based on results, and guide long-term hormone maintenance. Help clients build sustainable daily habits so their hormonal balance is self-maintaining. This phase creates the ongoing client relationship that builds recurring revenue.

checkpoint.question: What is the first step of the D.E.P.T.H. Method™?

options.label: Discover the client's full health story

checkpoint.successMessage: Yes! Discovery comes first — you need the full picture before you can evaluate anything.

sections.content: D — Discover: The Hormone Health Intake

Your intake session is everything. Unlike a doctor's 7-minute appointment, you spend **60 to 90 minutes** learning your client's full story. Ask about her menstrual cycle history from puberty to present. Ask about pregnancies, birth control use, perimenopause symptoms. Ask about sleep quality, energy patterns throughout the day, stress levels, digestive health, and what she eats in a typical day.
The most common thing clients say after a Discover session: 'No one has EVER asked me all of these questions before.' That experience alone builds trust and demonstrates your value as a specialist.
E — Evaluate: Connecting Symptoms to Root Causes

Once you have the full story, you map her symptoms to the 5 root causes. A woman gaining weight around her midsection, craving sugar at 3pm, and waking at 2am is showing classic signs of **cortisol dysregulation and blood sugar instability**. A woman with heavy periods, breast tenderness, and mood swings before her period likely has **estrogen dominance**, possibly driven by gut dysfunction or toxin exposure.
Common symptom-to-root-cause connections:
items: **Fatigue + weight gain + hair loss** — Often thyroid-related, driven by cortisol stealing thyroid resources
**Acne + chin hair + irregular cycles** — Blood sugar and insulin driving elevated testosterone
**Heavy periods + mood swings + breast tenderness** — Estrogen dominance from gut or toxin issues
**Anxiety + insomnia + afternoon crashes** — HPA axis dysregulation and cortisol imbalance
**Brain fog + low energy + depression** — Nutrient deficiencies (B12, iron, vitamin D, magnesium)

sections.content: P — Pinpoint: Starting with What Matters Most

This is where the D.E.P.T.H. Method becomes personal. Two clients can both present with fatigue, but one is driven by cortisol and the other by nutrient deficiency. Your job is to pinpoint what is driving THIS woman's imbalance. Always start with **blood sugar and cortisol** — they are the foundation. Until those are stable, other interventions will not hold.

checkpoint.question: When working with a new hormone health client, what should you stabilize FIRST?
checkpoint.successMessage: Correct! Blood sugar and cortisol are the foundation. Until those are stable, other hormones cannot properly rebalance.

sections.content: T — Transform: Targeted Lifestyle Changes

Now you create a personalized plan. The key is **sustainable, targeted changes** — not extreme diets or overwhelming protocols. For blood sugar: protein at every meal, eating within 60 minutes of waking, reducing refined carbohydrates. For cortisol: morning sunlight, evening wind-down rituals, adaptogen-rich foods. For gut health: fiber diversity, fermented foods, removing inflammatory triggers.
Transform phase strategies by root cause:
items: **Blood sugar** — Protein-first meals, paired carbohydrates, no naked carbs, consistent meal timing
**Cortisol** — Morning sunlight within 30 minutes of waking, cortisol-lowering evening routines, stress-reduction practices
**Gut health** — 30+ plant foods per week for microbiome diversity, fermented foods daily, identifying and removing inflammatory triggers
**Toxin reduction** — Swapping personal care products, filtering water, choosing organic for the Dirty Dozen, switching to glass food storage
**Nutrient repletion** — Magnesium-rich foods (dark chocolate, pumpkin seeds), zinc from oysters and beef, selenium from Brazil nuts, omega-3 from wild salmon

sections.content: H — Heal: Ongoing Support and Lasting Results

Hormone rebalancing takes time — typically **60 to 90 days** to see meaningful shifts, and **3 to 6 months** for full transformation. The Heal phase is where you provide ongoing accountability, adjust strategies based on symptom tracking, and help your client build habits that last a lifetime. This is also why clients stay with you for months, creating **recurring revenue** for your practice.

Most hormone health clients work with you for 3 to 6 months at **$250 to $500 per month**. That means each client is worth **$750 to $3,000** to your business. Just 10 active clients equals **$2,500 to $5,000+ per month**.

before.title: Before D.E.P.T.H. Method
items: Overwhelmed by the complexity of hormones
Clients enjoy conversations but do not see lasting results
Cannot explain your process to skeptical clients
No clear session structure or progress tracking
Imposter syndrome despite passion for the work

after.title: After D.E.P.T.H. Method
items: Structured framework that covers every client scenario
Clients experience measurable symptom reduction in 60-90 days
Professional process that builds trust and credibility instantly
Clear session plans with trackable progress markers
Confidence from combining passion with a proven system

sections.content: Can you see yourself using the D.E.P.T.H. Method to help women finally understand their hormones?
What Is Coming Next

You now have the complete D.E.P.T.H. Method framework for hormone health coaching. In the final lesson, you will learn exactly how to get your first paying clients — without spending a single dollar on advertising — and build a hormone health practice that generates **$5,000 or more per month** from home.

keyTakeaways: The D.E.P.T.H. Method gives you a repeatable framework for every hormone health client: Discover, Evaluate, Pinpoint, Transform, Heal
Always stabilize blood sugar and cortisol FIRST — they are the foundation for all other hormonal balance
Hormone rebalancing takes 60-90 days for initial shifts and 3-6 months for full transformation, creating recurring client revenue

lessons.title: How To Get Your First Clients
lessons.subtitle: Build a thriving hormone health practice from day one

sections.content: {name}, this is where everything comes together. You understand hormonal imbalance (Lesson 1). You have the D.E.P.T.H. Method (Lesson 2). Now let us talk about the part everyone worries about: how do I actually GET clients and start earning?

Here is the truth: getting your first hormone health clients is easier than you think. You do not need a website. You do not need social media followers. You do not need to spend a dime on ads. You need exactly ONE thing: a real conversation with a woman who is struggling with her hormones.
The Warm Market Strategy

Your first clients are not strangers on Instagram. They are women who already trust you. Think about the women in your life who have complained about fatigue, weight gain, mood swings, hot flashes, brain fog, or terrible periods. Think about the women who have told you they feel like they are going crazy and their doctor says everything is fine. Those women already see you as someone who cares. Now you have the **certification** to actually help them.
Your warm market includes:
items: Friends who complain about exhaustion, weight gain, or mood swings
Family members going through perimenopause, postpartum changes, or thyroid issues
Coworkers who talk about brain fog, afternoon crashes, or trouble sleeping
Women in your church, gym, book club, or neighborhood who are struggling
Social media connections who post about hormone struggles or health frustrations
Anyone who has ever said 'I feel like my body is working against me'

sections.content: The Conversation Framework

When a woman shares a hormonal struggle, simply say: 'I just completed a professional certification in hormone health coaching. I am working with a small number of clients right now and would love to offer you a **free 20-minute Hormone Health Assessment** to see if what I do might help.' This is not a sales pitch. It is a genuine offer of support from a trained specialist.

In that free assessment, use the Discover phase of the D.E.P.T.H. Method. Ask about her symptoms, her cycle, her energy, her stress. Within 20 minutes she will realize you understand her body better than her doctor does. That is when she asks: 'How do I work with you?'

checkpoint.question: What is the fastest path to getting your first hormone health clients?

options.label: Reaching out to your warm market

checkpoint.successMessage: Yes! Your warm market — women who already know and trust you — is the fastest path to your first paying clients.

sections.content: Pricing Your Services

Women invest thousands in doctor visits, lab work, supplements, and wellness programs that never address the root cause of their hormonal issues. Your guided coaching delivers what those approaches miss. Price your services to reflect the **transformation** you provide, not the time you spend.
Recommended pricing structure:
items: **Hormone Health Assessment:** Free (20 minutes to demonstrate your value)
**Single session:** $125 to $200 per session
**90-Day Hormone Reset Package:** $297 per month for 3 months ($891 total) — 4 coaching calls, personalized meal guidance, symptom tracking, email support
**6-Month Hormone Transformation:** $397 per month for 6 months ($2,382 total) — bi-weekly calls, comprehensive lifestyle overhaul, ongoing adjustments
**Group Hormone Health Program** (6-8 women): $197 to $397 per person per month

sections.content: Always lead with a 90-day package over single sessions. Hormones do not rebalance in one conversation. Real transformation takes sustained guidance over 60 to 90 days minimum. A 90-day container gives your clients the time they need AND creates predictable income for you.
Your Income Potential

The math is straightforward. If you enroll just **5 clients per month** in a 90-Day Hormone Reset at **$297 per month**, that is **$1,485 per month**. Scale to 15 active clients and you are at **$4,455 per month**. Add a group program with 8 women at **$297 per person** and that is another **$2,376** per launch. Many hormone health specialists reach **$5,000 to $8,000 per month** within their first year.
See what your monthly income could look like:

revealCard.teaser: See how a school nurse built a $6,000/month hormone health practice in 5 months...
revealCard.content: Rachel was a 44-year-old school nurse who was struggling with her own perimenopause symptoms. After getting certified, she started having conversations with other women in her community — teachers, parents, neighbors — who were dealing with the same frustrations. She offered free 20-minute Hormone Health Assessments and signed her first 3 clients in week two. By month 5 she had 18 active clients and was earning over $6,000 per month. She went part-time at her nursing job and is on track to transition fully into her hormone health practice this year.

checkpoint.question: Why should you lead with a 90-day package instead of single sessions?

options.label: Single sessions are too short to discuss anything
Hormones need 60-90 days minimum to rebalance, and packages create predictable income
Clients prefer to commit for longer periods

checkpoint.successMessage: Exactly! Hormone rebalancing takes time. A 90-day container gives clients the sustained support they need while creating reliable recurring revenue for you.

sections.content: Scope of Practice Reminder

As you build your practice, always honor your scope. You **educate** clients on how hormones work. You **guide** nutrition and lifestyle changes that support hormonal balance. You **support** clients through symptom tracking and accountability. You **refer** to endocrinologists, functional medicine doctors, and OB-GYNs for lab work, diagnoses, and clinical treatment. Staying in scope is what makes you trustworthy and protectable.
Your 30-Day Launch Plan
Follow this plan to get your first hormone health clients within 30 days:
items: **Week 1:** List 20 women in your life who have mentioned hormonal struggles. Reach out to 5 with your free Hormone Health Assessment offer.
**Week 2:** Conduct free 20-minute assessments. Use the Discover phase to demonstrate your expertise. Offer your 90-Day Hormone Reset to those who are ready.
**Week 3:** Share your certification journey on social media. Post about common hormone myths. Let women come to you with questions.
**Week 4:** Follow up with everyone you spoke to. Ask for referrals. Consider hosting a free 'Hormone Health 101' workshop to attract new potential clients.

sections.content: Can you picture yourself helping women finally feel like themselves again — and earning $5,000+ per month doing it?
Your Next Step

You have completed all three lessons of your Hormone Health Foundation training. You understand the root causes of hormonal imbalance, you have the D.E.P.T.H. Method to guide every client, and you know exactly how to get your first paying clients. Take the certification exam to earn your **ASI-accredited credential** and step fully into your new career as a Hormone Health Specialist.

You have the knowledge, the framework, and the strategy. Women in your life are struggling with their hormones RIGHT NOW and have no one to turn to. Take the exam, get certified, and reach out to your first 5 warm market contacts this week. They are waiting for you, {name}.

keyTakeaways: Your first clients come from your warm market — women who already trust you and are struggling with hormonal symptoms
Lead with a free 20-minute Hormone Health Assessment using the Discover phase of the D.E.P.T.H. Method
A 90-Day Hormone Reset at $297/month with just 15 active clients generates over $4,400 per month
